components.name: Primary Button
components.title: Primary Button
components.description: The primary call-to-action button used for main actions throughout the dashboard.
components.preview: <button class="px-4 py-2 bg-botnar-pink-500 text-white rounded-md hover:bg-botnar-pink-600 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-botnar-pink-500 focus:ring-offset-2 transition-colors">Primary Button</button>

screenReader.name: State Changes
screenReader.description: Focus and disabled states properly announced

examples.name: With Icon
examples.description: Button with icon for better visual hierarchy
examples.code:
<button class="btn btn-primary">
  <svg class="w-4 h-4 mr-2">...</svg>
  Download Report
</button>

examples.name: Loading State
examples.code:
<button class="btn btn-primary" disabled>
  <svg class="w-4 h-4 mr-2 animate-spin">...</svg>
  Processing...
</button>

bestPractices.title: Use for primary actions
bestPractices.description: Reserve primary buttons for the main action on a page or section

bestPractices.title: Keep text concise
bestPractices.description: Use clear, action-oriented text that describes what will happen

bestPractices.title: Don't use multiple primary buttons
bestPractices.description: Only one primary button should be visible in a given context

bestPractices.title: Don't disable without explanation
bestPractices.description: Always provide context when a button is disabled

variations.name: Secondary
variations.preview: <button class="px-4 py-2 bg-gray-100 text-gray-700 rounded-md hover:bg-gray-200 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-gray-500 focus:ring-offset-2 transition-colors">Secondary</button>

variations.name: Ghost
variations.preview: <button class="px-4 py-2 border border-botnar-pink-500 text-botnar-pink-500 rounded-md hover:bg-botnar-pink-50 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-botnar-pink-500 focus:ring-offset-2 transition-colors">Ghost</button>

checklist.name: Color Independence
checklist.description: Information not conveyed by color alone

checklist.name: Focus Management
checklist.description: Consider adding interactive elements for keyboard users

screenReader.name: Content Structure
screenReader.description: Card content properly structured for screen readers

screenReader.name: Data Relationships
screenReader.description: Clear relationship between title, value, and change

bestPractices.title: Use consistent formatting
bestPractices.description: Format numbers and percentages consistently across all cards

bestPractices.title: Provide context
bestPractices.description: Include comparison periods or benchmarks when showing changes

bestPractices.title: Don't overload with data
bestPractices.description: Keep each card focused on a single key metric

bestPractices.title: Don't rely only on color
bestPractices.description: Use icons and text to convey positive/negative trends
